title: Simple Graph MicroSim
description: An interactive visualization demonstrating basic graph structure with two nodes (Dan and Ann) connected by a friendship relationship. Features a property inspector panel for exploring node and edge attributes.
subject: Graph Theory, Data Structures, Network Visualization
learning_objectives: Understand the basic components of a graph data structure (nodes and edges)
Identify properties associated with nodes and edges
Recognize how relationships connect entities in a graph
Analyze the information stored in graph elements
author: Dan McCreary
creator: Claude Code with vis-network-generator skill

interaction.action: Display node properties in inspector panel
Display edge properties in inspector panel

prerequisites: Familiarity with the concept of relationships
